3. Updating the libraryÂ¶

How to update your copy of the library.

Update your copy of the code with Subversion (modify the path if the library was not installed in the suggested location):

$ cd /var/local/dataone/d1_common_python
$ svn update

The python code under d1_common/types/generated contains PyXB binding classes. It is generated from the DataONE schemas using PyXB. Currently, the latest version of the binding classes is included with the library, so generating them after a Subversion update should not be necessary. However, if the library is modified locally, they can be generated with:

$ cd /var/local/dataone/d1_common_python
$ ./pyxbgen_all.py
